Package com.qa.ngageplatform.utils

Class CommonUtil

java.lang.Object
com.qa.ngageplatform.utils.CommonUtil
public class CommonUtil extends Object
This Class is used to provide methods related to Handling of Document, Date , Sorting etc

    • getResourceDocumentPath

      public String getResourceDocumentPath(String fileName)
      This method is used to get File Path by taking FileName from .\test\resources\Documents
      Parameters:
      fileName - FileName in String format
      Returns:
      This will return the filepath according to fileName

    • getCurrentDateTime

      public String getCurrentDateTime()
      This method is used to get Current DateTime in "ddMMyyyyHHmmss" Format [Can be use as Random unique String]
      Returns:
      This will return the DateTime in "ddMMyyyyHHmmss" Format

    • getDateTime

      public String getDateTime(int Days)
      This method is used to get future/past DateTime in "MM-dd-yyyy hh:mm:ss a" Format depending on the provided Days
      Parameters:
      Days - Days value which user want example -1 for yesterday's date and 1 for tomorrow's date
      Returns:
      This will return the DateTime in "MM-dd-yyyy hh:mm:ss a" Format

    • getDateTime

      public String getDateTime(int Days, String format)
      This method is used to get future/past DateTime in user provided Format depending on the provided Days
      Parameters:
      Days - Days value which user want example -1 for yesterday's date and 1 for tomorrow's date
      format - User Specific Date Format
      Returns:
      This will return the DateTime in user provided Format

    • getCurrentDateTime

      public String getCurrentDateTime(String dateFormat)
      This method is used to get Current DateTime in user provided Format
      Parameters:
      dateFormat - User Specific Date Format
      Returns:
      This will return the DateTime in user provided Format

    • verifyFirstDateIsGreater

      public boolean verifyFirstDateIsGreater(String date1, String date2, String format)
      This method is used to compare two date [Return True is First Date 'date1' is Greater than Second Date 'date2' Otherwise Return False]
      Parameters:
      date1 - First Date in String Format
      date2 - Second Date in String Format
      format - User Specific Date Format
      Returns:
      This will return TRUE if date1 is greater than date2 else return FALSE

    • customiseSorting

      public List<String> customiseSorting(List<String> list)
      This method is used to Sort the List in Specific Ascending Order Priority: Symbol, Number, Alphabet [Ignoring Case-Sensitivity] Example: Raw List : abc,ACC,adC,[abc],1 Sorted List : [abc],1,abc,ACC,adC
      Parameters:
      list - Raw List (unsorted List)
      Returns:
      This will return Sorted List

    • convertStringToNumber

      public int convertStringToNumber(String value)
      This method is used to convert String to Number
      Parameters:
      value - Value in String Format which need to convert to Int Format
      Returns:
      This will return the value in Int Format
